page.title: 02Belmoredean Farm
page.content: They have got four hundred and fifty acres altogether.The{crops}they grow are barley,rough grass,wheat and oats. Their best growing crop is wheat.They have got two hundred and sixty acres of crop land .They have got fortyacres of paddock grass and sixty acres of one year grass.The fertilizers they use are potash and nitrogen.They have got a small pond with tench in it.They have got four cats,one dog,three race{horses}and ten other horses.They employ seven or eight people.Their busiest time is autumn. They have got fifty four cattle.They breed calves and have three bulls.The farm has lots of farm tools.Some of them are rollers,post driver,two trailers,a baler,a plough,four tracters.They have one car and a landrover.Their soil is clay.
